overview: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, when the eunuchs were playing power, the loyal minister Zuo Guangdou was murdered by impeaching the traitor Wei Zhongxian, and Man Sect died tragically under the dark power of Dongchang. His daughter Zuo Qinghan was rescued by Fang Tushan, a hundred households of Jinyiwei, who was the evidence of the party’s corruption and perverting the law, Zuo Qinghan
title: The Phantom Of Lost World
